iana.template_text:
From lindner&mudhoney.micro.umn.edu Fri Jun  4 14:15:40 1993
From: lindner&mudhoney.micro.umn.edu (Paul Lindner)
Subject: Registration of new MIME content-type/subtype
To: iana&ISI.EDU
Date: Fri, 4 Jun 93 16:15:26 CDT
Cc: gopher&boombox.micro.umn.edu, info-metamail&thumper.bellcore.com
Reply-To: lindner&boombox.micro.umn.edu
Content-Length: 1090
Status: RO
X-Lines: 37

MIME type name: video
MIME subtype name: quicktime

Required parameters: none

Optional parameters: none

Encoding considerations: Quicktime movies are binary data.  Transports
  that do not support binary streams should enocode the data
  appropriately.  Movies should be encoded as a single-fork movie file
  to facilitate transfer to non-macintosh platforms.

Security considerations: None

Published specification: 

 Quicktime for Macintosh Documentation Kit v1.6  R0455LL/B  $50
 in the Chapter "QuickTime Movie Resource Format" (18pp)

   or 

 Inside Macintosh: Quicktime TO563LL/A  $29.95

 Apple Computer Inc.
 Apple Programmers and Developers Association
 P.O. Box 319
 Buffalo, New York 14207-0319
 1-800-282-2732
